import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import BESSHighlights from'./BESSHighlights';import BESSFeaturedProjects from'./BESSFeaturedProjects';import BESSClientTestimonials from'./BESSClientTestimonials';import'./BESS.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const bessSolutions=[{title:'Grid Stabilization',description:'Our BESS solutions provide rapid response to grid fluctuations, ensuring a stable and reliable power supply for homes and businesses.',image:'/images/cleanco_8.png'},{title:'Renewable Integration',description:"Cleanco's BESS enables efficient storage of solar and wind energy, maximizing the use of renewable resources and reducing reliance on fossil fuels.",image:'/images/cleanco_9.png'},{title:'Peak Shaving',description:'By storing energy during off-peak hours and releasing it during peak demand, our BESS solutions reduce energy costs for consumers and businesses.',image:'/images/cleanco_10.png'},{title:'Energy Independence',description:"Cleanco's BESS empowers communities and businesses to generate and store their own energy, reducing dependence on centralized power grids and enhancing energy security.",image:'/images/cleanco_11.png'}];const BESS=()=>{// Animation variants for staggered entrance
const containerVariants={hidden:{opacity:0},visible:{opacity:1,transition:{staggerChildren:0.2,delayChildren:0.1}}};const cardVariants={hidden:{opacity:0,y:50,scale:0.95},visible:{opacity:1,y:0,scale:1,transition:{duration:0.6,ease:[0.4,0,0.2,1]}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"bess-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bess-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"bess-grid",variants:containerVariants,initial:"hidden",whileInView:"visible",viewport:{once:true,amount:0.3},children:bessSolutions.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.article,{className:"bess-card",variants:cardVariants,whileHover:{y:-12,scale:1.03,rotateY:5,transition:{duration:0.4,ease:[0.4,0,0.2,1]}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bess-image-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.title,className:"bess-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bess-image-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Learn More"})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bess-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"bess-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"bess-desc",children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.button,{className:"bess-learn-more",whileHover:{scale:1.05,backgroundColor:'#059669',transition:{duration:0.2}},whileTap:{scale:0.95},children:"Learn More"})]})]},item.title))})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BESSHighlights,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BESSFeaturedProjects,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BESSClientTestimonials,{})]});};export default BESS;
